artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Handprinted polyester jersey with large-scale black outlined tropical bird pattern in purple, grey, light brown and white. Ja-El fabric, Handprinted, 42 inch-wide bird with foliage. 27 3/4 inch vertical pattern repeat. Number written 1966. Purple, Red/Orange, Green and Blue

title: Tropic Birds
